titleStmt.title: Hippolitus translated out of Seneca by Edmund Prestwich ; together with divers other poems of the same authors.
Phaedra. English. 1651
titleStmt.author: Seneca, Lucius Annaeus, ca. 4 B.C.-65 A.D.
Prestwich, Edmund, fl. 1650-1651.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G.D. for George Boddington ...,

notesStmt.note: Translation of Seneca's Phaedra, which was based on Hippolytus, by Euripides--Oxford Classical Dict.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
